name: Thai Tea with almond milk
description: Thai tea is popular in Asia. To make it more healthy by using almond milk and low sugar
directions: 1. Take your tea sock and add thai tea. Put tea sock on boil water cup. To steep the tea.
2. Leave the tea sock for a couple minutes to extract the tea flavour.
3. Pour the tea to a cup. Mix all the the rest of ingredients except ice.
4. Bring the cup with the ice. Pour the tea to this cup.
